body_html: We've gone back and forth on disallowing it—for example, we could call tf.Graph.finalize() in the tf.train.start_queue_runners() method, but that would break a lot of code that mostly works. However, it seems reasonable to log an ominous warning, to discourage this kind of code. At least it should help debugging. I'll prepare a change.
body_text: We've gone back and forth on disallowing it—for example, we could call tf.Graph.finalize() in the tf.train.start_queue_runners() method, but that would break a lot of code that mostly works. However, it seems reasonable to log an ominous warning, to discourage this kind of code. At least it should help debugging. I'll prepare a change.
body: We've gone back and forth on disallowing it—for example, we could call `tf.Graph.finalize()` in the `tf.train.start_queue_runners()` method, but that would break a lot of code that _mostly_ works. However, it seems reasonable to log an ominous warning, to discourage this kind of code. At least it should help debugging. I'll prepare a change.
